# Portfolio Flutter App

## Project Overview
A Flutter mobile portfolio application with a deep ocean theme, mirroring the web portfolio design of Sheila Nicole Cheng.

## Design System
- **Primary Colors**: Dark navy (#010c1b), Ocean blue (#09173A), Accent (#64b4dc)
- **Theme**: Deep ocean/underwater aesthetic with floating particles and gradient backgrounds
- **Typography**: Playfair Display for headings, Segoe UI/system fonts for body

## Features
- Profile Screen with picture, name, bio, contact info, skills
- Edit Profile with form validation
- Projects showcase
- Posters gallery
- Contacts section
- Friends List with CRUD operations
- Settings/About screen
- Alert dialogs for confirmations

## Navigation
- Uses Navigator.push/pop for screen transitions
- Bottom navigation or drawer for main sections

## State Management
- Provider or setState for local state
- Form validation using TextFormField

## Running the App
```bash
flutter pub get
flutter run
```
